column4: Please... Firefox (any build) won't start for me in Ubuntu 9.10.. Help!
do you get this error?: /usr/bin/python: relocation error: /usr/bin/python: symbol __realpath_chk, version GLIBC_2.4 not defined in file libc.so.6 with link time reference
No.. it just says that it is already running though it is not really
